text: Alopoglossus avilapiresae is a species of lizard in the family Alopoglossidae. It is found in Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. ==References== Category:Alopoglossus Category:Reptiles described in 2020 Category:Taxa named by Marco Antônio Ribeiro Jr. Category:Taxa named by Simón E. Lobos Category:Taxa named by Pablo J. Venegas Category:Taxa named by Omar Torres- Carvajal Category:Taxa named by Fernanda P. Werneck
title: Alopoglossus avilapiresae
